comment: If a positive integer divides another integer, this other integer is equal to its positive powers modulo the positive integer. (Formerly part of the proof for ~ fermltl ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2014.) (Revised by AV, 19-Mar-2022.)
